did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: K.C. Parsons publications collection, 1915-1999
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes publications, published and unpublished ralating to urban planning issues and various national building projects.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes publications, published and unpublished ralating to urban planning issues and various national building projects.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: K.C Parsons publications collection, #6691. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
